title: Form 5472 (Information Return of a 25% Foreign-Owned U.S. Corporation or a Foreign Corporation Engaged in a U.S. Trade or Business)

sections.title: 1. Identifying Information (Initial part)
summary: Basic data of the entity filing this form.

fields.label: Reporting corporation name
fields.help: Enter the official legal name of the entity as it appears on IRS filings.

fields.label: EIN
fields.help: Provide the EIN assigned to the reporting corporation.

fields.label: Country of incorporation
fields.help: Country where the entity was formed.

fields.label: Principal business activity
fields.help: Describe the primary business activity during the tax year.

fields.label: Type of filer
fields.help: Choose the category that matches how the entity is filing Form 5472.

options.label: Foreign corporation engaged in a U.S. trade or business

fields.label: Final or amended return
fields.help: Check if this filing is the final return or an amended submission.

sections.title: 2. Part I – Reporting Corporation
summary: Additional information about the reporting entity.

fields.label: Date of incorporation
fields.help: Use the date recorded on the entity formation paperwork.

fields.label: Country of organization
fields.help: Country where the entity is legally organized.

fields.label: Type of entity
fields.help: Specify corporation, LLC treated as a corporation, etc.

fields.label: Accounting method
fields.help: Indicate cash or accrual, or other approved method.

sections.title: 3. Part II – 25% Foreign Shareholder
summary: Details for the foreign owner or single-member LLC owner.

fields.label: Foreign shareholder name
fields.help: Full name of the foreign shareholder reported on the form.

fields.label: Country of residence
fields.help: Country where the shareholder maintains primary residence.

fields.label: Percentage of ownership
fields.help: Enter the percentage of ownership held by the shareholder.

fields.label: Nature of ownership
fields.help: Explain whether the ownership is direct or indirect.

sections.title: 4. Part III – Related Party
summary: List parties with whom reportable transactions occurred.

fields.label: Related party details
fields.help: Describe each related party involved in reportable transactions.

sections.title: 5. Part IV – Monetary Transactions
summary: Report total annual inflows and outflows instead of individual invoices.

fields.label: Monetary transaction summary
fields.help: Summarize total cash inflows/outflows by category for the year.

sections.title: 6. Part V – Non-Monetary Transactions
summary: Capture capital contributions, asset use, IP transfers, and debt forgiveness.

fields.label: Non-monetary transaction summary
fields.help: List contributions, asset transfers, or debt forgiveness that lacked cash flow.

sections.title: 7. Part VI – Additional Information
summary: Answer control questions about ownership and accuracy.

fields.label: Ownership changes
fields.help: Note any ownership changes, transfers, or restructuring during the year.

fields.label: Accurate information confirmation
fields.help: Confirm that the information presented is complete and accurate.

fields.label: Other relevant transactions
fields.help: Include other significant related-party transactions not covered elsewhere.

sections.title: 8. Signature
summary: Signed by an authorized person from the entity.
bullets: Signature of a manager or officer

fields.label: Authorized signature
fields.help: Name and title of the person authorized to sign the return.

sections.title: 9. Critical Points
summary: Penalties start at USD 25,000 per Form 5472 for failure to file or maintain required records.
bullets: Form is filed with Form 1120 or 1120-F
Does not report taxes — only information
Always at least one reportable transaction in a foreign single-member LLC
